channel.title: Wow! an npc killing barrage!
channel.description: man! i made full working ancient for my server but ice barrage and the bursts kill EVERY npc on the server, whats the normal code for ice burst and ice barrage..thank you ;D

item.title: Wow! an npc killing barrage!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres my ice blitz one but usually ice blitz dont attack all npcs

if(magicID == 12881) {// Ice Burst
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 70) {
stillgfx(363, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(22);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
addSkillXP((40*hitDiff), playerMagic);
setAnimation(709);
} else {
sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell.");
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Wow! an npc killing barrage!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; attackNPCSWithin(368,5000, 1000); addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }
